long_description: At home on the bike, off the bike and wherever you roam, the men's tailored Giro Mobility Bike Overshorts are made of breathable cotton with just enough stretch to let you move freely. Rugged cotton/spandex twill provides 2-way stretch for a clean, classic fit and freedom of movement. Contoured waistband fits comfortably on and off the bike. Can be worn over cycling undershorts with a chamois (such as the Giro Bike Undershorts, sold separately) for added riding comfort. Pockets: 2 front, 2 rear.
short_description: At home on the bike, off the bike and wherever you roam, the men's tailored Giro Mobility Bike Overshorts are made of breathable cotton with just enough stretch to let you move freely.
